body_html:
Actually this is not necessary part of this script.
Solution in #17796. A quick fix here.
Modify tensorflow/contrib/lite/build_rpi_lib.sh

-CC_PREFIX=arm-linux-gnueabihf- make -j 3 -f tensorflow/contrib/lite/Makefile TARGET=RPI TARGET_ARCH=armv7
+CC_PREFIX=arm-linux-gnueabihf- make -j 3 -f tensorflow/contrib/lite/Makefile TARGET=RPI TARGET_ARCH=armv7 \
+$SCRIPT_DIR/gen/lib/rpi_armv7/libtensorflow-lite.a
body_text:
Actually this is not necessary part of this script.
Solution in #17796. A quick fix here.
Modify tensorflow/contrib/lite/build_rpi_lib.sh
-CC_PREFIX=arm-linux-gnueabihf- make -j 3 -f tensorflow/contrib/lite/Makefile TARGET=RPI TARGET_ARCH=armv7
+CC_PREFIX=arm-linux-gnueabihf- make -j 3 -f tensorflow/contrib/lite/Makefile TARGET=RPI TARGET_ARCH=armv7 \
+$SCRIPT_DIR/gen/lib/rpi_armv7/libtensorflow-lite.a
body:
Actually this is not necessary part of this script.
Solution in #17796. A quick fix here.
Modify ``tensorflow/contrib/lite/build_rpi_lib.sh``
```
-CC_PREFIX=arm-linux-gnueabihf- make -j 3 -f tensorflow/contrib/lite/Makefile TARGET=RPI TARGET_ARCH=armv7
+CC_PREFIX=arm-linux-gnueabihf- make -j 3 -f tensorflow/contrib/lite/Makefile TARGET=RPI TARGET_ARCH=armv7 \
+$SCRIPT_DIR/gen/lib/rpi_armv7/libtensorflow-lite.a
```
